title: Static Accent Color constant for use in appxmanifest
body:
In the .appxmanifest one can only specify the default colors or a hex value.
There should be an option to enter "accent" to let the default splashscreen have the users accent color.

comments.body: There is such a "magic" color. It's called "transparent".

Yeah, nice idea! This way i could theme the whole app with the users accent color.
Thus there wouldn't be black or white splashscreen anymore, which does obviously not fit the rest of the apps design (in colorizing).
